## VerticalFlyout class

Class for a flyout.

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getClientRect()](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.getclientrect_1_method.md) |  | Returns the bounding rectangle of the drag target area in pixel units relative to viewport. |
|  [getX()](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.getx_1_method.md) |  | Calculates the x coordinate for the flyout position. |
|  [getY()](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.gety_1_method.md) |  | Calculates the y coordinate for the flyout position. |
|  [isDragTowardWorkspace(currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.isdragtowardworkspace_1_method.md) |  | Determine if a drag delta is toward the workspace, based on the position and orientation of the flyout. This is used in determineDragIntention\_ to determine if a new block should be created or if the flyout should scroll. |
|  [layout\_(contents)](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.layout__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Lay out the blocks in the flyout. |
|  [position()](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.position_1_method.md) |  | Move the flyout to the edge of the workspace. |
|  [reflowInternal\_()](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.reflowinternal__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Compute width of flyout. For RTL: Lay out the blocks and buttons to be right-aligned. |
|  [scrollToStart()](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.scrolltostart_1_method.md) |  | Scroll the flyout to the top. |
|  [setMetrics\_(xyRatio)](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.setmetrics__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Sets the translation of the flyout to match the scrollbars. |
|  [wheel\_(e)](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.wheel__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Scroll the flyout. |
